summary: This document is a billing statement from AT&T Wireless detailing the monthly charges for an account. It includes information about previous balances, payments received, current charges, and usage details. The document highlights various service charges and fees associated with the account, including taxes and surcharges. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and charges associated with an AT&T Wireless account. It lists numerous calls made, their durations, and associated charges, indicating a pattern of communication over a specified period. The document is significant as it may provide insights into the communication habits of individuals involved in the Epstein case. This document contains detailed records of voice and data usage for an AT&T Wireless account, including call times, durations, and charges. It appears to be part of a financial investigation related to the Epstein case, providing insights into communication patterns.
keyFacts: The total amount due for the billing cycle is $52.54.
The billing cycle ended on July 11, 2004.
